item.description:
There will be free Cooking Class led by Tagon Engel and some of the contributors towards the community collective cookbook of New Haven they will be be demonstrating how to prepare some of these recipe's the next 2 Wed. evening. The admission is free in hope that they will entice you into purchasing one of the New Haven Collective Cook book. This book is enriched with all home cooked good-ness City Seed compiled from New Haven Cooks, Celebrating the culture richness of our city through food.

Lets Raise our Wine Glasses and Salute this Wonder Opportunity to Share in New Haven's Rich legacy.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: New Haven "Cooking Class"
